AppInfoForCaregiver: After logging in, the first screen you see contains your personal information. You can edit these details by clicking on the Edit Profile text and making changes on the subsequent page. By clicking on the avatar image, you can upload a photo. Additionally, there is a Send Invitation button on this screen. By clicking on it and entering the relevant Patient ID, you can view the information of the corresponding patient by clicking on the text where the Patient ID appears. By clicking on the three lines in the top left corner of the screen, you can access general information about the application.
AppInfoForPatient: After logging in, the first screen you see contains your personal information. You can edit this information by clicking on Edit Profile and making changes on the page that appears. You can upload a photo by clicking on the avatar image. To enter your blood pressure readings, click on Click Here for Blood Pressure Entry, and you can enter your values in the space that appears. Similarly, to enter your blood sugar readings, click on Click Here for Blood Sugar Entry and enter your values in the provided space. On the main screen, you can also see the current status of the values you have entered. By clicking on Medication at the bottom, you can edit your medications and notifications. When you click on Menu, you can navigate to different sections from the screen that appears. Lastly, by clicking on Appointments, you can manage your appointments and their notifications. By clicking on the three lines in the top left corner of the screen, you can access general information about the application.
BloodPressureEntrance: Click here for Blood Pressure Entrance
BloodSugarEntrance: Click here for Blood Sugar Entrance
DontHaveAccount: Don't have an account? Click here to sign up
HelpInfo: You can get text or voice help about the application by clicking here.
LoginClick: Already have an account? Click here to log in
Name: Name
SelectPatient: Select a patient to view details.
VoiceHelp: Click here for get Application Help via Voice
